testCase.name: POST /accounts given a uid, email and username should save uid, email and username to the database
POST /auth/register given an email and password should save the email and password to the auth provider
POST /auth/register given an email and password should respond with a 201 status code
POST /auth/register given an email and password should specify json in the content type header
POST /auth/register given an email and password should respond with a json object containing a unique user id
POST /auth/register when the email or password is missing should respond with a 400 status code
POST /auth/authenticate given an email and password should retrieve account from auth provider
POST /auth/authenticate given an email and password should respond with a 200 status code
POST /auth/authenticate given an email and password should specify json in the content type header
POST /auth/authenticate given an email and password should respond with a json object containing a unique user id
POST /auth/authenticate when the email or password is missing should respond with a 400 status code
